snippet: Classical Indian dance enjoyed a strong showing in Manhattan recently, with four Bharatanatyam and Odissi performances within several days.
abstract: Siobhan Burke reviews performances of Bharatanatyam and Odissi styles of classical Indian dance around New York City.
